Uses of Class
yaak.core.YaakException

Packages that use YaakException
yaak.agent This package implements agent operations. 
yaak.agent.communication This package implements lower level communications services. 
yaak.core This package provides core services such as logging and property handling. 
yaak.model This package provides a world environment for domain modeling. 
yaak.schedule This package provides general-purpose scheduling and thread pooling. 
 

Uses of YaakException in yaak.agent
 

Subclasses of YaakException in yaak.agent
 class AgentException
          AgentException extends YaakException, as a base for reporting agent-related exceptions.
 class DuplicateNameException
          DuplicateNameException reports duplicate agent name violations.
 class InconsistentStateException
          InconsistentStateException reports violations in the state of an agent or its container.
 

Uses of YaakException in yaak.agent.communication
 

Subclasses of YaakException in yaak.agent.communication
 class CommunicationException
          CommunicationException is the base exception class for communications-related exceptions.
 

Uses of YaakException in yaak.core
 

Methods in yaak.core that throw YaakException
static java.lang.String YaakSystem.getProperty(java.lang.String property, java.lang.String defaultValue)
          Provides framework-level, property look-up services.
 java.lang.String YaakProperties.get(java.lang.String property, java.lang.String defaultValue)
          Provides property look-up services.
 

Uses of YaakException in yaak.model
 

Subclasses of YaakException in yaak.model
 class ModelException
          ModelException is the base exception class for model-related exceptions.
 

Uses of YaakException in yaak.schedule
 

Subclasses of YaakException in yaak.schedule
 class ThreadPoolException
          ThreadPoolException extends YaakException, primarily as a tagging/typing exception.
